meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Stephanie Femrite Stevens Collin Adams Matt Volk Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6671.

td.p: Stephanie Femrite Stevens, a recycling operations specialist from Arbutus, Maryland
Collin Adams, a Presbyterian minister from Pollocksville, North Carolina
Matt Volk, a financial analyst from Cedar Rapids, Iowa (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,400)

tr.td: YOU SHOULD KNOW THIS
HAWAII... NOT!
THE AGRICULTURAL HALL OF FAME
"OY" VEY
(Alex: Each correct response will end in "O-Y".)
PARDON ME
(Jimmy: This season's hottest shows!)
